title: Chocolate Brown Midi Wrap Dress
image_prompt: flat-lay product render of a chocolate brown midi wrap dress, isolated on plain white background, high-detail fabric texture, visible stitching, waist tie belt, subtle matte sheen, short flutter sleeves, V-neckline, lightweight crepe fabric, no model, no mannequin, no human, apparel-only
style_fit: regular fit with adjustable waist tie
techpack: Wrap-style midi dress in lightweight crepe with short flutter sleeves and V-neckline. Self-fabric waist tie belt for adjustable fit. Hidden side zipper closure. Fully lined with polyester blend. Topstitch detailing along neckline and hem.
design_text:
